text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO What about Gov Cuomo who’s administration sent 6,300 recovering Covid-19 patients to nursing homes his policy helped to spread the virus to some of New York’s most fragile residents.  Why don’t you report this or is Gov Cuomo untouchable?
